title: Books on Gnosticism
description:
Here are some useful and hard to find books on Gnosticism.
Another Seed: Studies in Gnostic Mythology, by Stroumsa
The Apocalypse of Adam Considered in Light of its Egyptian Background, by Linder
The Name of God and the Angel of the Lord, by Fossum
Heralds of that Good Realm, by Reeves
Images of the Feminine in Gnosticism, by King
Gnosis, by Rudolph
Seek to See Him, by DeConick
Sethian Gnosticism and the Platonic Tradition, by Turner
The Egyptian Hermes, by Fowden
The Greek Magical Papyri, by Betz
The Original Gospel of Thomas, by DeConick
Theurgy and the Soul, by Shaw
